mapper.select: SELECT RIGHT(w.warehouseCode,3) AS warehouseCode ,w.warehouseName ,w.category1 ,w.category2 ,w.`area` ,w.location ,w.outPlace ,w.currentWeight ,w.maxWeight ,IF(maxWeight>0, ROUND(100*w.currentWeight/w.maxWeight), -1) AS weightPer ,w.`status` ,w.regDate ,w.updateDate FROM k1_tb_warehouse_info AS w WHERE mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT RIGHT(w.warehouseCode,3) AS warehouseCode ,w.warehouseName ,w.category1 ,w.category2 ,w.`area` ,w.location ,w.outPlace ,w.currentWeight ,w.maxWeight ,IF(maxWeight>0, ROUND(100*w.currentWeight/w.maxWeight), -1) AS weightPer ,w.`status` ,w.regDate ,w.updateDate FROM k1_tb_warehouse_info AS w WHERE w.warehouseCode = CONCAT('warehouseCode_',#{warehouseCode});

SELECT RIGHT(s.inventoryCode,3) AS inventoryCode ,RIGHT(s.itemCode,3) AS itemCode ,i.itemName ,i.itemType ,s.itemCount ,s.totalPrice ,s.`status` ,s.`comment` FROM k1_tb_stock AS s JOIN k1_tb_item_info AS i ON s.itemCode = i.itemCode WHERE s.warehouseCode = CONCAT('warehouseCode_',#{warehouseCode}) ORDER BY s.inventoryCode ASC LIMIT 10;
